metadata.title: Eastern Equatorial Pacific Rawinsonde Data
metadata.description: Weather balloon soundings have been collected since the mid-1990's from NOAA ships during TAO mooring cruises.  Sets of soundings are available at 6 month intervals, with some substantial gaps, mostly along the 110 W and 95 W lines.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: This data set has been collected to document the atmospheric structure in the cold tongue/ITCZ complex, and its relationship to short-term climate variations.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Continually

Access constraints: Acknowledgement of data source publication required.

Use constraints: Acknowledgement of data source publication required
